Docs.summary: Encapsulates the value and location of a cell for use when copying content to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This structure is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs.ClipboardRowContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
